div.h1: Teague ISD- Food Service Help during COVID - 19

img.alt: Teague ISD- Food Service Help during COVID - 19

strong.span: Starting Monday the 13th, we will re-open the Elementary serving site 10:30 -12:00 there will be social distancing protections in place.

span.span: Meals will be served from 10:30-12:00 as a drive-thru at THS.
Transportation of meals will be suspended until further notice.

strong.span: Teague ISD will be closed Friday, April 10, 2020 in observance of Good Friday.

p.span: If you have any questions, please contact Chad Satterwhite at csatterwhite@teagueisd.org.
